This package contains all classes to handle expected or not exceptions from code or client requests.

This package contains all classes that map each property of a DTO with the same properties of an entity.
br.com.kirgh.app.pks - package br.com.kirgh.app.pks
This package contains all classes that define the relation between two tables in order to achieve the Third Normal Form.

This package contains some projections that facilitate data merge from different related entities.
br.com.kirgh.app.repositories - package br.com.kirgh.app.repositories
This package contains all repository classes for encapsulating storage (e.g.: insert, update, delete and select data).

This package contains all service classes for encapsulating business definitions and data exceptions.

This package contains all server settings that are needed to successfully run the application.

This package contains some useful classes to facilitate the development of these APIs.
